DEEP DIVES
Around the Block: Soul Sand Valley
群系漫游：灵魂沙峡谷

Lazy bone zone
枯骨长眠于此

Duncan Geere


Minecraft’s new update has made the Nether a much more interesting place. Instead of endless chunks and chunks and chunks of Netherrack and lava, you’re now able to explore a collection of weird and wild new biomes.
新近的 Minecraft 游戏更新让下界成为了一个更加有趣的地方。你再也不会看到那无尽的下界岩与熔岩充斥着每一个区块，而是能够去探索一系列诡谲而又狂野的全新生物群系。

The traditional Nether is still there, in the Nether Wastes biome, but has been joined by Crimson Forests, Basalt Deltas, Warped Forests, and the Soul Sand Valley – which is the biome we’re featuring today.
传统意义上的下界景观还在 —— 在那名为“下界荒地”的生物群系中，但下界也迎来了群系新客：绯红森林，玄武岩三角洲，诡异森林，以及灵魂沙峡谷 —— 这位也正是我们今天要介绍的群系主角。

An aura of haunted stillness falls over the landscape of the Soul Sand Valley. No plants grow in its barren soul soil, except for the occasional patch of crimson roots eking out a lonely existence.
灵魂沙峡谷被如鬼魅般的静谧气息所笼罩着。贫瘠的灵魂土无法滋养任何植物的生长，除去偶尔出现的绯红菌索还在苟延残喘着。
Once, however, it must have been a richer ecosystem – there are huge fossils dotted across the biome that must have once been a part of titanic creatures that roamed the lands. “Those fossils weren’t easy to implement,” explains former Mojang developer Maria Lemon. “Things that worked well in the Overworld like placing a premade structure had to be reinvented and done again when doing it in the Nether.”
然而，曾经这里一定是一片相较于现在来说更加富饶的生态系统 —— 看呐，那些遍布整个群系的巨型化石一定就是那些曾经在这片土地上漫游过的庞然巨兽的遗骸。“想要做出那些化石并不容易，”前 Mojang 开发人员 Maria Lemon 这么说道。“在主世界里运行良好的东西，譬如预设结构之类的，想要把它们转移到下界的话，则必须全盘来过。”

Whatever vast beasts those skeletons belonged are long-gone today, replaced by skeletons, Ghasts and the occasional Strider. Interestingly, you’ll also find Endermen tourists here, suggesting that perhaps there’s something they’re looking for...
不论那些骨架曾经是多么威猛的巨兽，今时今日，它们早已不复存在，取而代之的则是骷髅、恶魂，偶尔还有炽足兽的身影。有趣的是，你还能在这找到一些“观光游览”着的末影人，这说明……也许这里藏着些它们所渴求的东西……

The Soul Sand Valley is, as its name suggests, a great place to collect soul sand. It’s also the only place in the game where soul soil can be collected – a new block that doesn’t slow mobs down, can be lit on fire to make soul fire, and allows for the creation of basalt. Soul soil is also a crafting ingredient for soul torches and soul campfires, and can be used in place of soul sand to spawn a Wither.
灵魂沙峡谷，正如其名，是个收集灵魂沙的好地方。它也是游戏里唯一一个能收集灵魂土的地方 —— 一种游戏中的全新方块，它不会减缓生物的步伐，而能使于其上点燃的火焰变为灵魂火，同时也能用于制造玄武岩。灵魂土同样也是灵魂火把与灵魂营火的合成材料(之一)，它也可以代替灵魂沙来召唤凋灵。

You’ll find huge pillars of basalt in the Soul Sand Valley, as well as glowstone, magma blocks, lava springs, gold ore, quartz ore, and ancient debris. There are Nether fortresses and bastions to be found in this biome too, so tread carefully!
灵魂沙峡谷内还有巨型的玄武岩柱、荧石、岩浆块、熔岩泉、(下界)金矿石、(下界)石英矿石与远古残骸。下界要塞和堡垒遗迹同样也会在这片群系里生成，所以小心了！
Despite the rich pickings in terms of resources, it’s hard to suggest setting up home in a Soul Sand Valley. Sure, you’re unlikely to fall into a lava sea – but the commonly-found Ghasts and Endermen mean that any shelter you build is unlikely to last very long. It’s a place to get in, get what you need and then get out before you attract too much attention.
尽管这里资源丰富，但在灵魂沙峡谷里安家仍不是个好建议。自然，我想你没什么可能会掉进熔岩海里 —— 但这里遍地的恶魂与末影人也意味着，你的小房子大概撑不了多久。这是个自取所需的好地方，但请在你吸引了太多的注意力之前尽快离开吧。
Stay tuned to this series to find out where else in the Nether regions we like to set up home, and share your Nether biome survival tips by tweeting us at @minecraft.
请持续关注本系列，来看看下次我们准备在下界的哪一个区域安个家，也请给我们的官方 Twitter @minecraft 分享你的下界生物群系生存日常的小技巧吧！
